attributes.action: Exempt (or heavily discount) smart fortwo and other similar micro city cars from planned congestion charging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the government will likely ignore any petition calling for the government to scrap this policy anyway (because it's yet another way to get money out of us to spend on fighting other people's wars!), I propose that if we have to be charged by the mile, cars that are designed to cause less congestion and pollution (such as the smart fortwo) are exempted from charges or at least are given a substantial (at least 75%) discount.
